Question
========

Research suggests that the effect of traumatic childhood experiences on depressive symptoms in young mothers is partly explained by stress reactivity.

What is the mediating variable here? 
Answerlist
----------
* Traumatic childhood experiences.
* Depressive symptoms.
* Age.
* Stress reactivity.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
